BRIEF OF COMPANY
“Webex Broadband Internet” is The Thana/ Upazila ISP Licensed and IT-related services and solutions provider. “Webex Broadband Internet” was formed in 16 July 2018. “Webex Broadband Internet” shown the fastest growth and attained a high level of customer confidence to become the preferred and the leading ISP Business in Narsindi Sadar Thana in Narsindi District at Dhaka Division of Bangladesh. Which made “Webex Broadband Internet” is the most excellent ISP & IT enable service provider in Narsindi District of Bangladesh. “Webex Broadband Internet” has deployed a high-quality Network infrastructure backbone that consists of a City-Wide optical fiber and Wide Area Network (WAN) that can connectivity solutions.

BRIEF OF COMPANY
Reeth IT Limited is an official licensee of BTRC to National wide Internet service provider (ISP NATIONAL WIDE) We specialize in the utilization of highly skilled IT and business specialists to satisfy the needs of clients striving for excellence. We having the focus on the Enterprise Application, Web Development, Mobile Application & Games Development and Professional Training. We have gathered stability with proven success in delivering cost-effective but quality service to our clients in Korea, Bangladesh, Canada & USA. Our highly qualified staffs are continuously trained in today's evolving standards, platforms and technologies. Their technical expertise and dedication to quality has enabled companies of all sizes to leverage the strategic, tactical and financial benefits of outsourcing their most demanding requirements to us. We continuously strive to be our customer’s Preferred Partner for providing solutions for their requirements and we guarantee your satisfaction! Our goal is to develop a long term and mutually beneficial partnerships with progressive companies who demand the highest level of quality and professionalism.

BRIEF OF COMPANY
Mirnet is the brand name of BTS Communication (BD) Ltd. It is one of the sister concerns of Mir Group, the leading conglomerate of Bangladesh who are involved in constructions, ceramic, pharmaceutical, energy, telecommunications, information technology, food and beverages. Mir group have shown excellence in the involved sectors and have earned recognition and reputation. BTS Communication (BD) Ltd is a company under the umbrella of Mir Group. Under the guidance of the top management of Mir Group, BTS is garnering recognition and showing excellence.

Ticket
Dhaka Network BD
Abdullah Al Sharif
A-303 Upazila
Visit Website
Company Profile
Directors Information
Addresses
Pop List
Photo Gallery
Google Map
Member Since :
Valid Till :
BRIEF OF COMPANY
Dhaka Network BD is a leading Internet Service Provider and IT solution company in Bangladesh. It has obtained ISP license from BTRC. Dhaka Network BD aims to provide fastest Internet connectivity by using the most advance and reliable equipment. Our careful activities will help you make informed decisions and stay ahead of the competition. We have dedicated professional team to install and maintenance. We gained in-depth knowledge for last 12 years. Our full range of services for corporate offices includes website design & development solutions, Antivirus solutions and Networking solutions. We have a full range of Web services that are designed to meet any or all of your needs. We are committed to give you best support.
Company Details :
Company Name :
Dhaka Network BD
Email :
info@dhakanetworkbd.com
Mobile Number :
8801718929640
ISPAB Membership Number :
A-303
BTRC License Type :
